summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ChciAI.cz website - Czech AI consulting platform. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend mostly working with one UI interaction issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Chat bubble not clickable due to emergent-badge overlay intercepting pointer events
ui_bugs.details: Element A#emergent-badge is positioned over the chat bubble, preventing user interaction

passed_tests: Homepage loads with all sections (Hero, Services, About, Contact)
Navigation links work correctly (Služby, O nás, Kontakt)
Contact form submission successful with proper validation
AI Chat API responds correctly in Czech using Claude Sonnet 4.5
Calendly widget loads and displays properly
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix chat widget overlay issue - emergent-badge element is blocking chat bubble clicks. Consider adjusting z-index or positioning of chat widget to ensure it's above platform overlays.
